Validation.Condition: ShipmentKey attribute OR the ShipmentNo, ShipNode and SellerOrganizationCode attributes must be passed and must be valid.

Error.Description: YDM: Shipment does not exist for the input passed

Validation.Condition: Shipment cannot be removed from a Wave if packing has started.

Error.Description: YDM: The Shipment is being packed and cannot be removed from wave.

Validation.Condition: Shipment cannot be removed from Wave if any one of the shipment's tasks are in InProgress status.

Error.Description: WMS: One or more tasks of the Shipment are in InProgress status. Shipment cannot be removed from Wave.
